title: io.quarkus:quarkus-bom's entries should exclude banned artifacts
body:
### Description

This is a generalization of https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/issues/26468 and https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/issues/26468 where @rsvoboda is asking for moving some specific exclusions from extension modules to quarkus-bom.



### Implementation ideas

It would be nice if the tool used for BOM flattening could take the banned dependencies defined in [independent-projects/enforcer-rules/.../quarkus-banned-dependencies.xml](https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/blob/main/independent-projects/enforcer-rules/src/main/resources/enforcer-rules/quarkus-banned-dependencies.xml) into account and add the exclusions as needed to the BOM.
